text: Lobster Cave is a cave on Liuqiu Island, off Pingtung County, Taiwan. ==Name== "Lobster Cave" is a calque of the cave's Chinese name. It supposedly derives from lobsters who lived there over a century ago that were driven out by the island's residents during a night raid.. ==Geology== The cave is limestone and coral, surrounded by coral reefs, potholes, and gullies. It is accessible at low tide. ==See also== * Geology of Taiwan * Black Dwarf & Beauty Caves ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * . Category:Caves of Taiwan Category:Landforms of Pingtung County
title: Lobster Cave
